name: Switcher default
heading: Dynamically transition through different content panes.
usage: The switcher component consists of a number of toggles and their related content items. Add the data-uk-switcher="{connect:'#ID'}" attribute to the element which contains the toggles, targetting the same id as is used on the element containing the content items. Add the .uk-switcher class to the same element. Typically the switcher is combined with other components, some of which will be shown here.
